cards.title: Vector
setup: At the start of the game, put {Vector}'s villain character cards into play, “Asymptomatic Carrier“ side up, with 40 HP.
gameplay: Whenever {Vector} is dealt damage, play the top card of the villain deck.
If {Vector} regains all his HP, he escapes. Game over.

Supervirus is indestructible. Cards beneath it are indestructible and have no game text. Whenever Supervirus is in play and there are {H + 2} or more cards beneath it, flip {Vector}'s villain character cards.
If {Vector} is dealt damage by an environment card, he becomes immune to damage dealt by environment cards until the end of the turn.
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, {Vector} regains 2 HP.
flippedGameplay: Whenever {Vector} flips to this side, remove Supervirus from the game. Put all virus cards that were beneath it into the villain trash.
Reduce damage dealt to {Vector} by 1 for each villain target in play.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.

openingLines.default: You think you can stop me? You've already lost! Every drop of blood is a death sentence.

cards.title: Anticoagulant
body: Increase damage dealt to {Vector} by 1.
When {Vector} is dealt damage, destroy this card and {Vector} deals each hero target X toxic damage, where X is the amount of damage that was dealt to {Vector}.

flavorQuotes.text: What are you gonna do, bleed on me?

cards.title: Assassin's Signature
cards.body: {Vector} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} projectile damage. That hero must destroy 1 of their ongoing or equipment cards.

flavorQuotes.text: It's the personal touches that let you know someone cares.

cards.title: Bioterror Squad
body: At the start of the villain turn, shuffle a Virus card from the villain trash into the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} projectile damage, then {Vector} deals this card 1 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Spread the germs, destroy the evidence. Got it.

cards.title: Blood Sample
body: When this card enters play, {Vector} deals each hero target 1 toxic damage.
At the start of the villain turn, if Supervirus is in play and {Vector} was dealt {H * 2} or more damage last round, you may put this card beneath Supervirus.

flavorQuotes.text: He's leaving bits of himself everywhere. Gross.

cards.title: Delayed Symptoms
body: Destroy {H - 1} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.
Discard the top card of each hero deck.

flavorQuotes.text: This isn't over. I'm just getting started.

cards.title: Elite Training
body: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
When this card is destroyed, each player must discard 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: You saved my life. Which means this is{BR}all your fault, when you think about it.

cards.title: Hostage Shield
body: Play this card next to the hero with the lowest HP. That hero cannot deal damage.
At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Would anyone else like to be{BR}completely predictable?

cards.title: Hot Zone
cards.body: {Vector} deals each non-villain target 2 toxic damage.

cards.title: Hyperactive Immune System
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, {Vector} regains X HP, where X is the number of hero Ongoing and Equipment cards in play.

flavorQuotes.text: He got hit with every{BR}biological weapon there is, and{BR}somehow survived. Now he's the weapon.

cards.title: Lethal Force
body: {Vector} deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H - 1} melee damage.
{Vector} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: All you super-powered mutants and lab rats are the same. You get complacent.

cards.title: Quarantine Protocols
body: Environment targets are immune to damage.
At the end of the villain turn, each player must discard a card.
When this card is destroyed, it deals each hero target {H} lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This little gizmo is overriding the{BR}doors. Enjoy your stay!

cards.title: Supervirus
body: At the start of the villain turn you may put 1 Virus card from the villain trash beneath this card. Then, {Vector} deals each hero 1 toxic damage and regains {H * 2} HP.
If {Vector} is destroyed, the heroes lose.

cards.title: Undiagnosed Subject
body: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
When this card is destroyed, reveal the top card of the villain deck. If a Virus card is revealed you may put it beneath Supervirus, otherwise discard or replace it.

flavorQuotes.text: Any one of his hired thugs could{BR}be an unwitting carrier.

cards.title: Vendetta
cards.body: {Vector} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} psychic damage. That hero must discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: You have to tell me{BR}about that sometime.

cards.title: Virulent Blade
body: When this card enters play, {Vector} deals himself 2 irreducible melee damage.
At the end of the villain turn, {Vector} deals each hero target 2 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: If you don't mind, I'll draw first blood.

cards.title: VR-5 Razortail
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the start of the villain turn, {Vector} regains {H} HP.
